title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture        Model of a typical covered wagon used during the voyage west. NPS Photo     The Oregon Trail crosses the southern portion of Hagerman Fossil Beds.  The Monument is one of only four units in the National Park system that contains parts of the Oregon National Historic Trail. Ruts for the trail can be seen at the Oregon Trail Overlook parking lot.                       Oregon Trail Reenactment   19 Photos  An Oregon Trail reenactment
